title: What does the project champion orb and project skin orb give you?
body: I have enough tokens for both project champion orb and project skin orb, but I was just wondering what you get from them..

replies.body: project skin shard gave me project zed which i already have ._.

Exactly what it says. You get a champ shard or a skin shard.

The "Project skin Shard" is a guaranteed project skin.
Nah , they dont give you a Project Skin , they give you a random skin ..... i got a shitty skin for skarner ....
The project skin shard gives a random project skin except the newest three. you bought the wrong thing.

Champion orb => 740 to 1260 Blue essence (or shards for that worth)
Skin orb => have not used them because unlocking champions is hard af right now and i would rather use the mission to unlock champs and not skins

the project skin orb gives a random skin 

the project skin shard gives a random project skin excluding the three new project hunter skins {{sticker:katarina-love}}

A random champion shard or a random skin shard, respectively. 

Nothing very special.
